title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Management
body: Park Management       There's a new National Park in Paterson, New Jersey. How do you envision Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park in the future? Over the coming months, we will be collecting your suggestions and comments to help us create a vision for the kind of place we want Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park to be in the future. Learn more about how to get involved Sign up on our electronic mailing list to receive information about Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park.
